content: note should read k2 in ws set up row instead of ks sorry about that guys don t know how that one got by me as always if anything else creeps up or is a miss let me know i will reload pattern with correction may 13/2013 note that i have uploaded an updated version that includes an excel spreadsheet for a stitch count that will be achieved for every other row this was graciously given to me by deborah douglas deborah had a friend that needed a row by row count in order to knit this so she created an excel spreadsheet for her i have added this to the pattern for those that need it
